entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
